heroSection.h1: Make your interior more minimalistic & modern
heroSection.p: Turn your room with panto into a lot more minimalist and modern with ease and speed

outCategories.p2: Discover quality furniture, curated styles, and exceptional service at Our Store. We make furnishing your home easy and enjoyable.

cardOne.head: Extensive Catalog
cardOne.p: A wide selection of furniture styles, categories, and price points.

cardTwo.head: Detailed Product Descriptions
cardTwo.p: Comprehensive information including dimensions, materials, care instructions, and warranty details.

cardThree.head: Room Planner/Visualizer
cardThree.p: Tools to help customers visualize furniture in their own spaces.

footer.p: The advantage of hiring a workspace with us is that gives you comfortable service and all-around facilities.

searchPopup.p: Discover Elegant Comfort for Every Room

signUp.passwordValid4: Password must contain at least one number
